title: Caitlyn or Ezreal
body: Hello, I'm a silver one player trying to get gold before the season ends, I can't decide wether I should buy Caitlyn or Ezreal, I played ezreal like 10 times on the free rotation and didn't lose a game, I find him fun and I think I'm good at hitting skill shots for a silver player, although Caitlyn seems like she'd carry harder and do way more damage, I need to be able to self peel in my Elo and carry but I'm not sure which, any ideas or opinions help thanks :) (I already have sivir and jhin, also have Lucian, jinx, Ashe and twitch but I don't play them or like them other than Lucian)

replies.body:
If you want to climb, dont play new champions. Play the ones you are best at.

In silver, just about anything is viable, your skill with a champion is far more important than metagame and high-rank winrates.
do you use lock screen? cause stay away from caitlyn if you do.
